info.title: Netatmo - Security
info.description: This is a sample test for describing NETATMO's APIs with the OAS3 standard definition using swagger.

externalDocs.description: Find out more about Netatmo API

get.summary: Retrieve user's homes and their topology.

parameters.name: home_id
parameters.description: Filter by the ID of the home you want

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Number of events to retrieve. Default is 30

get.summary: Returns all the events until the one specified in the request. This method is available for Welcome, Presence and the Smart Smoke Alarm

parameters.name: event_id
parameters.description: Your request will retrieve all the events until this one

get.summary: Returns most recent events. This method is only available for Welcome.

parameters.name: person_id
parameters.description: Your request will retrieve all events of the given home until the most recent event of the given person

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of events to retrieve. Default is 30.

get.summary: Returns previous events. This method is available for Welcome, Presence and the Smart Smoke Alarm

parameters.name: event_id
parameters.description: Your request will retrieve events occured before this one

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Number of events to retrieve. Default is 30.

get.summary: Returns the snapshot associated to an event.

parameters.name: image_id
parameters.description: id of the image (can be retrieved as "id" in "face" in Gethomedata for Welcome, or as "id" in "snapshot" in Getnextevents, Getlasteventof and Geteventsuntil)

post.summary: Sets a person as "Away" or the Home as "Empty". The event will be added to the user’s timeline. This method is only available for Welcome.

parameters.name: person_id
parameters.description: If a person_id is specified, that person will be set as "Away". If no person_id is specified, the Home will be set as "Empty".

post.summary: Sets a person or a group of person "at home". The event will be added to the user’s timeline.  This method is only available for Welcome.

parameters.name: person_ids[0]
parameters.description: If a person_id is specified, that person will be set as "Away". If no person_id is specified, the Home will be set as "Empty".

post.summary: Links a callback url to a user. This method is available for Security products.
Dissociates a webhook from a user.

Persons.description: Only available if the home own Security Camera

OutdoorEvent.description: first event from list (offset:0) has picture by url, nexts are filename.

video_status.description: status of the video (recording, deleted or available)

type.description: type of events (see written documentation in security section)

time.description: time of occurence of the event

camera_id.description: id of the camera that detected the event

device_id.description: id of the device that detected the event

sub_type.description: subtype of SD and Alim events (see written documentation in security section)

time.description: time of occurence of the event

camera_id.description: id of the camera that detected the event

device_id.description: id of the device that detected the event

person_id.description: id of the person the event is about

video_status.description: status of the video (recording, deleted or available)

is_arrival.description: if person was considered away before being seen during this event

time.description: time of occurence of the event

camera_id.description: id of the camera that detected the event

device_id.description: id of the device that detected the event

person_id.description: id of the person the event is about

video_status.description: status of the video (recording, deleted or available)

time.description: time of occurence of the event

camera_id.description: id of the camera that detected the event

device_id.description: id of the device that detected the event

video_status.description: status of the video (recording, deleted or available)

person.description: array of persons in the home

camera.description: array of all cameras in the home

smokedetectors.description: array of all smoke detectors in the home

vpn_url.description: (restricted return parameter, only returned on OWN camera or with access scope)

modules.description: array of the module associated to the camera

last_seen.description: timestamp of the time the person was last seen

out_of_sight.description: true if the person is considered away from home

pseudo.description: if pseudo is missing, the person is unknown

scopes.read_thermostat: to retrieve thermostat data ( Getroommeasure, Homestatus)
